XXvamvuppu:1: VMv_1.1 adhigataparamārthaḥ śrīghanavyūha eva prati tuṣitajanārthaṃ yo 'bhavac chvetaketuḥ /
XXvamvuppu:2: tata iha jagadarthaṃ cābhavac chākyaketuḥ sa jayatu jitamṛtyur darśitānantamāyaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:7: VMv_1.4 sarvathā vañcanaṃ mṛtyor muktānām eva yujyate /
XXvamvuppu:11: VMv_1.6 yāvaj jīvati saṃsāre dharmācārī jitendriyaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:13: VMv_1.7 na vinā jīvitāt sāraṃ saṃsāre kiṃ cid īkṣyate /
XXvamvuppu:15: VMv_1.8 na duṣkaraṃ yataḥ kiṃ cid upāyair yuktiyojitaiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:17: VMv_1.9 lakṣaṇād dūrato mṛtyuṃ jñātvā yuktā pratikriyā /
XXvamvuppu:18: maste patati vajrāgnau suprajño 'pi karoti kim //
XXvamvuppu:20: kathyate jñāyate yena maraṇaṃ bhāvi tatparaiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:21: VMv_1.11 mṛtyor lakṣaṇam ājñātuṃ vāñchā cet kasya cid bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:35: VMv_1.18 ariṣṭānām anantatvān notpattir yugapan matā /
XXvamvuppu:36: kramaśo 'pi na sarveṣām api tv ekādisaṃkhyayā //
XXvamvuppu:37: VMv_1.19 adṛṣṭvā lakṣaṇaṃ yatra mṛtyur dṛṣṭaḥ kva cid bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:38: niścetur dūṣaṇaṃ tatra na tu lakṣaṇanāstitā //
XXvamvuppu:39: VMv_1.20 dṛṣṭvāpi lakṣaṇaṃ yatra na mṛtyur dṛśyate kva cit /
XXvamvuppu:41: VMv_1.21 niścite dūrato mṛtyau prasiddhir mahatī bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:46: niyato 'niyataś ceti vijñeyaḥ sa tu yatnataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:48: kālo niyata ity ukto 'niyatas tu viparyayāt //
XXvamvuppu:49: VMv_1.25 sphuratsaṃdhi kapolaṃ syād atyarthaṃ mṛtyudarśanāt /
XXvamvuppu:51: VMv_1.26 karkaṭo rāśir āṣāḍhaḥ puṣyas tu makaro mataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:56: vyabhre nabhasi madhyāhne cchāyāyāś ca nirīkṣaṇam //
XXvamvuppu:61: VMv_1.31 āṣāḍhāt kramaśo vṛddhiḥ puṣyād dhrāsaḥ kramāt tathā /
XXvamvuppu:63: VMv_1.32 kṣayakāle bhaved vṛddhir vṛddhikāle kṣayo yadi /
XXvamvuppu:64: tam eva kālam ārabhya mṛtyur māsād viniścitaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:66: kṣayakāle 'py atikṣaye mṛtyur eva na saṃśayaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:68: yāni ṣaṭ ṣaḍ dināny atra kālākālanirūpaṇam //
XXvamvuppu:71: VMv_1.36 pādayos tālukāṃ viddhvā nābhau vedho yadā bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:73: VMv_1.37 pādayos tālukāṃ viddhvā yadi cakṣuś ca vidhyati /
XXvamvuppu:75: VMv_1.38 pādayos tālukāṃ viddhvā nāsikāṃ yadi vidhyati /
XXvamvuppu:76: tribhir dinais tadā nūnam ekākī yāti pañcatām //
XXvamvuppu:77: VMv_1.39 kuṭiprasrāvayoḥ kāle tulyaṃ syād yadi hañchikā /
XXvamvuppu:78: tasyām eva hi velāyāṃ mṛtyur varṣeṇa tasya hi //
XXvamvuppu:80: jihvāgrādarśane mṛtyur vāsaraiḥ syāt tribhir nṛṇām //
XXvamvuppu:81: VMv_1.41 māsaiś caturbhir mṛtyuḥ syāt karṇāgre tīkṣṇavedhanāt /
XXvamvuppu:82: sadyo mṛtyur bhaven nūnam ūrṇāsthāne pravedhanāt //
XXvamvuppu:83: VMv_1.42 tulyakālaṃ yadā vedhaś candrasūryagato bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:84: tadā māsād bhaven mṛtyuḥ puṇyam evārjayet tataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:85: VMv_1.43 bhagaliṅgasamāyoge madhye śeṣe ca hañchikā /
XXvamvuppu:86: syāc cet tulyaṃ tadā māsaiḥ pañcatvaṃ yāti pañcabhiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:87: VMv_1.44 hastayoḥ pādayoś caiva kaniṣṭhānāṃ ca saṃdhayaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:88: catvāro yasya vidhyanti tulyaṃ māsāt sa mṛtyubhāk //
XXvamvuppu:89: VMv_1.45 hṛtkaṇṭhamadhyayor vedhas tulyakālaṃ yadā bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:90: pakṣatrayeṇa mṛtyuḥ syād yadi dharmaṃ na sevate //
XXvamvuppu:91: VMv_1.46 tulyakālaṃ yadā vidhyet tālukānāṃ trayaṃ muhuḥ /
XXvamvuppu:92: tribhir dinais tadā mṛtyur yadi śakrasamo bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:93: VMv_1.47 vāmākṣiputtalīcchāyāṃ yo na paśyati darpaṇe /
XXvamvuppu:94: saptāhān mriyate nūnaṃ yadi na syāt pratikriyā //
XXvamvuppu:95: VMv_1.48 maithune sati ghaṇṭāyā nādaś cet karṇayor bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:96: tribhir māsais tadā mṛtyur yadi brahmasamo bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:97: VMv_1.49 kṛṣṇaṃ yadi bhavec chukraṃ śuklāyāṃ pratipattithau /
XXvamvuppu:98: ṣaḍbhir māsais tadā mṛtyur lohitaṃ vyādhisūcakam //
XXvamvuppu:99: VMv_1.50 karṇamūle bhruvor madhye mastakāgre pṛthakpṛthak /
XXvamvuppu:100: yadi vedho 'pratīkāro mṛtyuḥ sadyas tadā bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:102: vedhaḥ sadāho yasyāsau ṣaḍmāsān mriyate dhruvam //
XXvamvuppu:103: VMv_1.52 pādāṅguṣṭhād dhṛdayāntaṃ yāvat kaṇṭhaṃ śiro 'thavā /
XXvamvuppu:107: VMv_1.54 cakṣurnāsikayor madhye spandanaṃ cen na dṛśyate /
XXvamvuppu:109: VMv_1.55 netrayos tārake mliṣṭe sahasā bhavato yadi /
XXvamvuppu:111: VMv_1.56 akasmān nāsikā vakrā karṇau bhraṣṭau svadeśataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:113: VMv_1.57 akasmād dhṛdayaṃ nimnaṃ syāc cet pakṣāt tadā mṛtiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:115: VMv_1.58 akasmāt kṛṣṇarekhā syāj jihvāyā yadi madhyataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:116: dṛḍho vā dantasaṃdaṃśas tadā mṛtyur dvirātrataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:118: tasminn eva dine mṛtyur athavā pañcavāsaraiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:119: VMv_1.60 nakheṣu raktavarṇeṣu sahasā yady araktatā /
XXvamvuppu:120: ṣaḍbhir māsais tadā mṛtyur yadi mantrādi nācaret //
XXvamvuppu:121: VMv_1.61 akasmāj jāyate sthūlaḥ kṛśaḥ kruddho bhayākulaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:122: yas tasya mṛtyur varṣeṇa yadi dharmaṃ na sevate //
XXvamvuppu:123: VMv_1.62 indriyāṇi na gṛhṇanti yathāsvaṃ yasya gocarān /
XXvamvuppu:124: muhuḥ skhalati vāṇī ca muhuś ca mativibhramaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:125: VMv_1.63 cakṣuṣī sravato nityaṃ dṛṣṭarūpe 'pi vibhramaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:126: darpaṇe salile vāpi svacchāyāṃ yo na paśyati //
XXvamvuppu:127: VMv_1.64 rātrāv indradhanuḥ paśyed divā nakṣatramaṇḍalam /
XXvamvuppu:129: VMv_1.65 divā chāyāpathaṃ paśyed ulkāyāḥ patanaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:131: VMv_1.66 candradvayaṃ dvisūryaṃ vā svaśirojvalanaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:133: VMv_1.67 paśyet pretapiśācān adṛśyān anyāṃś ca bhīṣaṇān /
XXvamvuppu:134: prakampate bhṛśaṃ caiva mūrchito vā bhaven muhuḥ //
XXvamvuppu:135: VMv_1.68 chardiṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca suvarṇarajataprabham /
XXvamvuppu:136: paśyed ekaikaśas tasya mṛtyur māsāvadher bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:137: VMv_1.69 kaṇṭḥoṣṭhatālujihvānāṃ chedaṃ chidraṃ tanau tathā /
XXvamvuppu:138: yaḥ paśyet tasya mṛtyuḥ syāt ṣaḍmāsābhyantare dhruvam //
XXvamvuppu:140: śuṣyanty abhīkṣṇaṃ ṣaḍmāsān maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet //
XXvamvuppu:143: VMv_1.72 arundhatīṃ rohiṇīṃ ca dhruvaṃ chāyāpathaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:147: VMv_1.74 rātrau sūryaṃ divā candraṃ svanetre jvalanaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:148: tārāṃ merupramāṇāṃ ca samudraṃ ca nadīm iva //
XXvamvuppu:149: VMv_1.75 nābhau hikkāṃ gude hañchāṃ varṇaṃ padmopamaṃ mukhe /
XXvamvuppu:151: VMv_1.76 hṛdaye krandanaṃ sāśru prakampam atha tāluni /
XXvamvuppu:153: VMv_1.77 candracchidraṃ ravicchidraṃ chidraṃ bhūmau tathāmbare /
XXvamvuppu:154: ātmanaiva hi yaḥ paśyet paśyen mṛtyuṃ sa pakṣataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:156: varṣān mṛtyur bhavet tatra bhaiṣajyādi pratikriyā //
XXvamvuppu:157: VMv_1.79 ardhaṃ śītaṃ tathā coṣṇam ardhaṃ yasya kalevaram /
XXvamvuppu:163: VMv_1.82 yasya mastakam āruhya trivarṇo yāti vegataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:165: VMv_1.83 śabdo na śrūyate dehād dhastābhyām apamārjitāt /
XXvamvuppu:167: VMv_1.84 yugapan nirgamo bāhujaṅghayor yasya gacchataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:169: VMv_1.85 kardame pāṃśudeśe vā purataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'pi vā /
XXvamvuppu:172: varṣatrayātyayān mṛtyur yadi bhrāntyā na kalpitaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:177: VMv_1.89 paśyed indradhanuś citraṃ dīrghāyuḥ puruṣaḥ sadā /
XXvamvuppu:178: ṣaḍmāsāyur na tat paśyed iti karmavicitratā //
XXvamvuppu:183: VMv_1.92 nāgān anekaśaḥ paśyet saṃyatān iva saṃtatam /
XXvamvuppu:185: VMv_1.93 prabhāte vātha sāyāhne jyotsnāyāṃ vā ciraṃ puraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:186: vitatya bāhū svacchāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā paśyec chanair nabhaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:187: VMv_1.94 tatrāpi dṛśyate chāyā dhavalā nararūpiṇī /
XXvamvuppu:191: VMv_1.96 jānūpari sthitau bāhū kṛtvā mūrdhni tathāñjalim /
XXvamvuppu:193: VMv_1.97 yadā tv ekaṃ dalaṃ tatra vikāsi parilakṣyate /
XXvamvuppu:194: tasyām eva tithau nūnaṃ ṣaḍmāsān maraṇaṃ bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:195: VMv_1.98 sūryamārgagate vāyau lakṣaṇīyam idaṃ trayam /
XXvamvuppu:196: śrotre śirasi netre ca śabdo dhūmo dyutis tathā //
XXvamvuppu:197: VMv_1.99 karṇau pidhāya sudṛḍhaṃ gambhīro gulgulo dhvaniḥ /
XXvamvuppu:199: VMv_1.100 viṃśatiṃ divasān yāvat pañcaviṃśatim eva vā /
XXvamvuppu:201: VMv_1.101 eṣām apy antarāleṣu śodhyāḥ ṣoḍaśa vāsarāḥ /
XXvamvuppu:204: yo na paśyati tasya syān mṛtyur varṣatrayāvadheḥ //
XXvamvuppu:207: VMv_1.104 apīḍane 'pi taddṛṣṭau mṛtyuḥ syāc chatavāsaraiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:208: etat sāmānyato jñeyaṃ viśeṣas tv ayam ucyate //
XXvamvuppu:211: VMv_1.106 sūrye 'pi yadi candrasya kramaḥ syāt pūrvavat tadā /
XXvamvuppu:213: VMv_1.107 svarūpasya viparyāsāt ṣaḍmāsān maraṇaṃ bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:215: VMv_1.108 bādhirye śrotrayor mṛtyuś caturmāsātyayād bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:221: VMv_1.111 nābher viparyayān mṛtyuḥ pañcāhād upaśliṣyati /
XXvamvuppu:225: VMv_1.113 svasthasya lālājihvā cen niḥsparśā dravavarjitā /
XXvamvuppu:227: VMv_1.114 amlāditvaṃ ca rasato nīlāditvaṃ ca varṇataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:229: VMv_1.115 yugapatpañcadhāraṃ vā vāmāvartaṃ vigandhi ca /
XXvamvuppu:230: mūtraṃ yasya bhaven mṛtyus tasya ṣaḍmāsamadhyataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:231: VMv_1.116 kṛṣṇe vā yadi vā śukle pakṣe reto 'tikṛṣṇakam /
XXvamvuppu:232: mṛtyuḥ ṣaḍmāsato no cet tenaiva syāt pratikriyā //
XXvamvuppu:234: candre prabhañjane vāti praveśāt syāt pratikriyā //
XXvamvuppu:235: VMv_1.118 sthiratve 'pi svadehasya tacchāyā cañcalā yadi /
XXvamvuppu:237: VMv_1.119 dakṣiṇāśāgatāṃ chāyām ātmano yadi paśyati /
XXvamvuppu:238: adyaiva mṛtyur asmākam iti paśyed anityatām //
XXvamvuppu:240: svapno 'py asatyaḥ sarveṣāṃ nātaḥ śraddhā na yujyate //
XXvamvuppu:241: VMv_1.121 devatādarśitaḥ svapnaḥ satyasvapno 'tha yo naraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:242: sa svapne pratyayaṃ kṛtvā mṛtyuliṅgāni paśyatu //
XXvamvuppu:243: VMv_1.122 kiṃśukaṃ kovidāraṃ ca puṣpitaṃ karavīrakam /
XXvamvuppu:247: VMv_1.124 gardabhaṃ yaḥ samārūḍhaḥ prayāyād dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
XXvamvuppu:248: bhūyaś ca na nivarteta tadvat tasyāpi jīvitam //
XXvamvuppu:249: VMv_1.125 yaś cāpi vānarārūḍhaḥ prayāyād dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
XXvamvuppu:250: tatrasthaś ca vibudhyeta mṛtyuḥ syāt tasya pūrvavat //
XXvamvuppu:251: VMv_1.126 daṇḍaṃ vā caityayūpaṃ vā naro yas tv abhirohati /
XXvamvuppu:252: vālmīkaṃ pāṃśurāśiṃ vā ṣaḍmāsān na sa jīvati //
XXvamvuppu:253: VMv_1.127 kālī kumārī saṃkruddhā yā tu badhnāti bandhanaiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:254: kālarātrī tu sā jñeyā saptāhān mṛtyukārikā //
XXvamvuppu:255: VMv_1.128 kṛṣṇavastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naraṃ /
XXvamvuppu:257: VMv_1.129 tamo vā praviśet svapne śvabhraṃ vā cārakaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:258: vṛkṣād vā prapatet svapne sa mṛtyor antike sthitaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:259: VMv_1.130 vṛkṣaṃ tṛṇaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā viphalaṃ yas tu paśyati /
XXvamvuppu:260: suptaḥ śīrṣe śarīre vā ṣaḍmāsān na sa jīvati //
XXvamvuppu:261: VMv_1.131 yo vānararathārūḍho gacchet pūrvāṃ diśaṃ naraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:265: VMv_1.133 ekābdavigame nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet /
XXvamvuppu:271: VMv_1.136 kharam āruhya vegena vrajantaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam /
XXvamvuppu:273: VMv_1.137 raktamālyāni gandhāṃś ca raktāmbaram athāpi vā /
XXvamvuppu:274: yaḥ svapne labhate tasya mṛtyuḥ syād aṣṭamāsataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:275: VMv_1.138 saṃkhyātītāni bāhyāni mṛtyuliṅgāni tāni kaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:277: VMv_1.139 etāni mṛtyoḥ pratipādakāni liṅgāni bāhyāni yathoditāni /
XXvamvuppu:278: vijñāya tāni tvaritaṃ vidheyo mantrādibhir vañcana eva yatnaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:280: VMv_2.1 idānīm āntaraṃ mṛtyor lakṣaṇaṃ kathyate sphuṭam /
XXvamvuppu:281: tac ca vāyūdayāj jñeyaṃ vāyur ghrāṇāsyagocaraḥ //
XXvamvuppu:282: VMv_2.2 bāhyalakṣaṇamātrān na mṛtyoḥ samyag viniścayaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:283: yāvad ādhyātmikaṃ samyag lakṣaṇaṃ naiva niścitam //
XXvamvuppu:284: VMv_2.3 ubhayor niścayān mṛtyur niścitaḥ syāt parisphuṭam /
XXvamvuppu:288: VMv_2.5 nirūpakanaro yatra dine kālaṃ nirūpayet /
XXvamvuppu:289: tad ārabhya dinaṃ mṛtyur mitakālātyayād bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:294: VMv_2.8 pratipadaṃ samārabhya śuklāṃ vahati candragaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:295: dināni trīṇi pavanaḥ tataḥ sūrye dinatrayam //
XXvamvuppu:296: VMv_2.9 dinatrayaṃ punaś candre tataḥ sūrye dinatrayam /
XXvamvuppu:298: VMv_2.10 evaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ samārabhya sūrye vahati mārutaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:300: VMv_2.11 kramasyāsya viparyāsāt tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ suniścitāt /
XXvamvuppu:301: ṣaḍbhir māsair bhaven mṛtyur dharmam eva smaret tataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:305: vahed vāyur yadi tadā kalyudvegādi jāyate //
XXvamvuppu:306: VMv_2.14 trimārgago bhaved vāyuḥ prakṛteḥ parivarjanāt /
XXvamvuppu:308: VMv_2.15 saṃkrāntirahito vāyur ubhayor api mārgayoḥ /
XXvamvuppu:309: vahed yasya daśāhāni saṃkrāntau mriyate hi saḥ //
XXvamvuppu:311: tasya nāśaṃ vijānīyād ahorātrān na saṃśayaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:312: VMv_2.17 itaś cetaś ca bahudhā yasyārdhapraharaṃ vahet /
XXvamvuppu:313: vāyus tasya vijānīyāt pūjanaṃ lābham eva ca //
XXvamvuppu:314: VMv_2.18 saṃkrāntipañcakaṃ yasya samatītya mukhe vahet /
XXvamvuppu:315: vāyus tasyārthanāśaḥ syād udvego vā bhayādi vā //
XXvamvuppu:316: VMv_2.19 vāmanāsāpuṭe vāyuḥ saṃkrāntīś ca trayodaśa /
XXvamvuppu:317: samatītya vahed yasya tasya rogādi jāyate //
XXvamvuppu:318: VMv_2.20 puṭadvayaṃ parityajya yadā vaktreṇa gacchati /
XXvamvuppu:319: tad ahar jīvitaṃ tasya yadi vajrasamo 'py asau //
XXvamvuppu:321: pañcāhaṃ ced vahet sūrye mṛtyur aṣṭādaśābdataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:323: pañcāhaṃ ced vahen mṛtyur bhavet pañcadaśābdataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:324: VMv_2.23 śrāvaṇasyāpi ced evaṃ mṛtyur dvādaśavarṣataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:325: jyeṣṭhe 'pi ced bhaved evaṃ mṛtyuḥ syān navavarṣataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:326: VMv_2.24 caitramāsasya saṃkrāntikālam ārabhya ced vahet /
XXvamvuppu:327: pañcāhaṃ māruto mṛtyuḥ ṣaḍbhir varṣais tadā bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:328: VMv_2.25 māghamāsasya saṃkrānteḥ pañcāhaṃ ced vahen marut /
XXvamvuppu:330: VMv_2.26 sarvatra dvitricaturo vāyuś ced divasān vahet /
XXvamvuppu:331: abdabhāgais tu te śodhyā yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:332: VMv_2.27 evam eva vahec candre vāyuś cen mṛtyuvarjitāḥ /
XXvamvuppu:336: VMv_2.29 samasaptagate sūrye janmarkṣe candramā yadi /
XXvamvuppu:338: VMv_2.30 yatra rāśau naro jātas tasmād yaḥ saptamo 'paraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:340: VMv_2.31 rāśau tatraiva candraś cej janmanakṣatrago bhavet /
XXvamvuppu:341: pauṣṇaḥ kālaḥ sa vijñeyas tatra mṛtyor nirūpaṇam //
XXvamvuppu:344: VMv_2.33 yatra velākṣaṇe vāyor gatir anyā pravartate /
XXvamvuppu:345: tatra velākṣaṇe pūrṇe mṛtyur nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:346: VMv_2.34 pauṣṇe kāle vahed vāyur dinārdhaṃ yadi sūryagaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:350: VMv_2.36 pañcāhaṃ ca daśāhaṃ ca tathā pañcadaśāhakam /

XXvamvuppu:352: VMv_2.37 tathaiva ced vahed vāyur viṃśatiṃ pañcaviṃśatim /
XXvamvuppu:353: ṣaḍbhir māsais tribhiś caiva yathāsaṃkhyaṃ bhaven mṛtiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:355: syād dvyekamāsaiḥ pakṣeṇa digdinaiś ca kramān mṛtiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:356: VMv_2.39 triṃśat tu caikatriṃśac ca dvātriṃśad divasān yadi /
XXvamvuppu:358: VMv_2.40 trayastriṃśaddinaṃ yāvat sūrye ced vāti mārutaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:359: tasminn eva dine mṛtyur viṣṇor api na saṃśayaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:361: noktāḥ ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyā ye teṣāṃ śodhanam ucyate //
XXvamvuppu:362: VMv_2.42 ṣaḍdinaṃ cet tribhir varṣaiś caturviṃśativarjitaiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:364: VMv_2.43 aṣṭāhaṃ cet tribhir varṣair dvāsaptatidinonitaiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:366: VMv_2.44 vahed ekādaśāhaṃ cen mārutaḥ sūryagocaraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:372: VMv_2.47 vahet saptadaśāhaṃ ced vāyuḥ sūryaikagocaraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:383: ādau kṛtvā dinārdhaṃ sakaladinam athā-harniśaṃ yāvad eva tasmād ahnor dvayaṃ ca tridinam atha catur-vāsarān vyāpya yāvat /
XXvamvuppu:384: prāṇo nāḍyāśrito yo vahati dinapater udgame savyahīne tasmin vijñeyam etad bhuvanaravidiśo maṅgalaṃ ṣaṭ catuṣkam //
XXvamvuppu:385: VMv_2.53 pañcabhyaḥ pañcaviṃśaddivasagatir ihā-rohate pañcavṛddhyā tasmād ekottareṇa triguṇitadaśakaṃ tryuttaraṃ yāvad eva /
XXvamvuppu:386: kāle pauṣṇe samās tās trinayanaśaśinaḥ ṣaṭtriyugmendavo ye māsās te 'hāni śeṣās tithidigiṣuguṇa-dvīndavo jīvitasya //
XXvamvuppu:388: āyuṣaḥ prāṇavāyoś ca dināny aṅkakramāl likhet //
XXvamvuppu:389: VMv_2.55 ity āntarāṇy api mayā kathitāni mṛtyor liṅgāny ariṣṭam iti cāparanāmakāni /
XXvamvuppu:390: vijñāya tāni sapadi tvaritair vidheyo dhyānādibhir maraṇa-vañcana eva yatnaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:396: VMv_3.3 śraddhayā śakyate kartuṃ mṛtyuvañcanam udyataiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:397: śraddhām ato dṛḍhīkuryād anyathā syāc chramaḥ paraḥ //
XXvamvuppu:398: VMv_3.4 kāyakleśair bahuvidhair na cāpy arthasya rāśibhiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:399: dharmaḥ saṃprāpyate sūkṣmaḥ śraddhāhīnaiḥ surair api //
XXvamvuppu:400: VMv_3.5 śraddhā dharmaḥ paraṃ sūkṣmaḥ śraddhā jñānaṃ tapo hutam /
XXvamvuppu:401: śraddhā svargaś ca mokṣaś ca śraddhā sarvam idaṃ jagat //
XXvamvuppu:402: VMv_3.6 sarvasvaṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi dadyād aśraddhayā yadi /
XXvamvuppu:403: naivāpnuyāt phalaṃ kiṃ cic chraddadhānas tato bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:405: dharmo hi trāyate mṛtyor mṛtyur dharmeṇa vañcyate //
XXvamvuppu:406: VMv_3.8 na dharmarahitas tiṣṭhet pramādāt kṣaṇamātrakam /
XXvamvuppu:407: brahmāpi hi vinā dharmaṃ na prabhur mṛtyuvañcane //
XXvamvuppu:408: VMv_3.9 viduṣāṃ saṃmato dharmaḥ satyaṃ dānaṃ tapaḥ kṣamā /
XXvamvuppu:409: viśeṣeṇa kṛpā yeṣāṃ kiṃ teṣāṃ dharmavistaraiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:410: VMv_3.10 kāruṇyasyandi hṛdayaṃ yeṣāṃ sattveṣu saṃtatam /
XXvamvuppu:411: teṣāṃ jñānaṃ ca mokṣaś ca kim anyair dharmavistaraiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:413: tām evābhyasyato nityaṃ mṛtyur dūrāyate kramāt //
XXvamvuppu:414: VMv_3.12 alpāyur api dīrghāyuḥ sadyaḥ syāj jīvayann imān /
XXvamvuppu:416: VMv_3.13 dīrghāyur api mandāyuḥ sadyaḥ syān mārayann imān /
XXvamvuppu:427: darśanād vandanān nityam āyuṣo vṛddhir āpyate //
XXvamvuppu:438: VMv_3.24 satkṛtya vācayed bhikṣūn svayaṃ vā saṃpravartayet /
XXvamvuppu:439: dīrgham āyus tathā prāpya mṛtyor bhavati vañcakaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:449: āsannam api dūrasthaṃ mṛtyuṃ kurvanti paṇḍitāḥ //
XXvamvuppu:450: VMv_3.30 maṇḍalālekhanād dhomān mudrāṇāṃ bandhanād api /
XXvamvuppu:455: puṇyāt syād āyuṣo vṛddhis tadvṛddher mṛtyuvañcanam //
XXvamvuppu:456: VMv_3.33 ityādi leśato dharmaḥ sūcitas tasya vistaraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:457: svayam unnīya kartavyas taj jñātvā mṛtyuvañcakaiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:465: dhārakaḥ sarvamṛtyūnāṃ vañcakaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:466: VMv_3.38 na cātra maṇisāmarthye saṃśayo yuktibhāg yataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:468: VMv_3.39 paṭāder agrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vijanadeśagaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:470: VMv_3.40 ākāram uccaret pūrvaṃ tato ro lig iti sphuṭam /
XXvamvuppu:474: VMv_3.42 uktvā vairocanaṃ pūrvaṃ paścāt tāre dvir uccaret /
XXvamvuppu:475: tuttāre dvis ture dviś ca svāhāntaṃ mṛtyuvañcanam //
XXvamvuppu:480: VMv_3.45 oṃ ādau ruru tato 'taḥ sphurupadam ataḥ param /
XXvamvuppu:484: VMv_3.47 lakṣaśaḥ koṭiśo vāpi śuddhaḥ śraddhāvidhānataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:485: dhautaś ca nirjalaiḥ kṣīrair huto dūrvādināthavā //
XXvamvuppu:491: mokṣo 'pi jāyate nūnaṃ kiṃ punar mṛtyuvañcanam //
XXvamvuppu:492: VMv_3.51 namas traiyadhvikānāṃ prāk tathāgatānāṃ syāt tataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:494: VMv_3.52 balinām iti padād oṃ tato 'samasamapadam /
XXvamvuppu:496: VMv_3.53 hara hara smara smaraṇa vigatarāgapadāt /
XXvamvuppu:497: buddhadharmate tataḥ syāt sara sara samabalā //
XXvamvuppu:499: lakṣaṇe jvala jvalanasāgare syāt padaṃ tataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:500: VMv_3.55 dattvā svāhāpadaṃ cānte bhaven mantraḥ śatākṣaraḥ /
XXvamvuppu:504: VMv_3.57 oṃ uktvā padaṃ vimale jaya vare 'nu cāmṛte /
XXvamvuppu:505: hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ tataḥ svāhāpadaṃ brūyād anantaram //
XXvamvuppu:508: VMv_3.59 hūṃ hūṃ ruru cale svāhā mantro 'yaṃ mṛtyuvañcakaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:510: VMv_3.60 japtvā daśākṣaraṃ mantraṃ taṃ mṛtyuñjayasaṃjñinam /
XXvamvuppu:511: daśalakṣaṃ tato homaṃ kurvīta kusumaiḥ sitaiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:514: VMv_3.62 oṃ ādau tata āṅkāraḥ syād īṅkāras tataḥ param /
XXvamvuppu:515: ūṃ oṃ mṛtyuñjaya oṃ syād ayaṃ mantro daśākṣaraḥ //
XXvamvuppu:516: VMv_3.63 kalpādijīvanārthaṃ ye proktā mantrās tathāgataiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:517: tair āyuḥ sādhitaṃ dīrghaṃ tad dīrghaṃ mṛtyuvañcanam //
XXvamvuppu:518: VMv_3.64 mantrair yaiḥ śāntikarma taiḥ syād vṛddhir āyuṣaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:519: yaiḥ syād āyuṣo vṛddhis taiḥ syān mṛtyuvañcanam //
XXvamvuppu:520: VMv_3.65 mantrāṇām api sāmarthye saṃśayo naiva yuktibhāk /
XXvamvuppu:523: na tad vastvantaraṃ loke yan na mantraiḥ prasidhyati /
XXvamvuppu:527: VMv_3.68 ekākinīm athānyair vā bheṣajaiḥ sahitāṃ sadā /
XXvamvuppu:528: tataḥ sthiravapur bhūtvā mṛtyudvāraṃ na paśyati //
XXvamvuppu:529: VMv_3.69 anyeṣām api divyānāṃ bheṣajānāṃ niṣevaṇāt /
XXvamvuppu:537: VMv_3.73 ūrdhvādhobhyāṃ saṃpuṭayogaṃ yaḥ satataṃ kurute hitayogam /
XXvamvuppu:538: tasya suruṣṭo 'py avihatatejāḥ kiñcitkārī no yamarājā //
XXvamvuppu:539: VMv_3.74 mṛtasaṃjīvanam api kva cid dṛṣṭam upāyataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:542: sadyo yad vā mṛtasyaiva patitair dhātubindubhiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:545: VMv_3.77 punarujjīvanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nirodhaś cātra śasyate /
XXvamvuppu:551: VMv_3.80 āgamoktam idaṃ siddhaṃ bahūnāṃ vārigandhayoḥ /
XXvamvuppu:555: VMv_3.82 bheṣajasyāpi sāmarthye saṃśayo naiva yujyate /
XXvamvuppu:557: VMv_3.83 iti vidhāya bahiṣkriyam ādarān maraṇavañcanam atra yathābalam /
XXvamvuppu:558: prabalamṛtyumahābhayaśaṅkayā kuruta saṃprati tat punar āntaram //
XXvamvuppu:561: kathyate yena niyataṃ vañcyate mṛtyur udyataiḥ //
XXvamvuppu:563: saṃsargarahite ramye parvatādau kva cit sthitaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:574: VMv_4.8 maraṇe duḥkhasaṃdarśī dharmadarśī ca jīvite /
XXvamvuppu:578: VMv_4.10 namaḥ samantakāyeti prāg vākcittapadaṃ tataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:579: vajrāṇāṃ ca namo vajrakrodhāyeti padaṃ vadet //
XXvamvuppu:588: hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā mantro vighnanivāraṇaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:591: VMv_4.16 oṃ prāg uktvā huluhulutiṣṭhatiṣṭhapadaṃ tataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:594: oṃ amṛta hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ mama rakṣāṃ kuru svāhā //
XXvamvuppu:600: dhyātvā vairocanaṃ śuklam āsaṃsāraṃ na mṛtyubhāk //
XXvamvuppu:609: VMv_4.25 dhyātvā tasyāpi hṛdaye lokeśam aparaṃ tathā /
XXvamvuppu:611: VMv_4.26 koṭisaṃkhyā bhaved yāvat tāvad dhyānam idaṃ smaret /
XXvamvuppu:613: VMv_4.27 dṛṣṭvā yogeśvaraṃ mṛtyur mriyate svayam eva hi /
XXvamvuppu:614: anye 'pi skandhajā doṣāḥ svayam āyanti nāśitām //
XXvamvuppu:623: VMv_4.32 dhyāyād ekāgracittaḥ san ṣaḍ māsān dṛḍhaniścayaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:624: japec cākhinnacittaḥ san mantram enaṃ daśākṣaram //
XXvamvuppu:625: VMv_4.33 oṅkāram ādito dattvā paścāt tāre prayojayet /
XXvamvuppu:626: tuttāre syāt ture paścāt svāhāntaḥ sārvakarmikaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:633: VMv_4.37 kavitā vaktṛtā medhā prajñā caikāntanirmalā /
XXvamvuppu:634: anyā ca vāñchitā siddhiś cakrād asmāt prajāyate //
XXvamvuppu:647: VMv_4.44 ṣaḍ māsān bhāvayed yogī sarvasaṅgavivarjitaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:650: dhyātvā candrakramān mṛtyuṃ kalpādīṃś ca vināśayet //
XXvamvuppu:653: VMv_4.47 jihvāṃ tālugatāṃ kṛtvā dantair dantān asaṃspṛśan /
XXvamvuppu:657: VMv_4.49 tato mṛtyuṃ jayet sadyaḥ palitādīṃś ca nāśayet /
XXvamvuppu:661: VMv_4.51 adhikāni śataiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sahasrāṇy ekaviṃśatiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:663: VMv_4.52 praveśaḥ śasyate vāyor yataḥ so 'mṛtasaṃcayaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:664: amṛtaṃ jīvanopāyas tena mṛtyur na bādhate //
XXvamvuppu:665: VMv_4.53 praveśaṃ gaṇayed vāyoḥ śanair lakṣādisaṃkhyayā /
XXvamvuppu:668: bhraṣṭāyuḥ san naro 'vaśyaṃ pañca varṣāṇi jīvati //
XXvamvuppu:669: VMv_4.55 dvilakṣādijapād evam unneyā vṛddhir āyuṣaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:671: VMv_4.56 sahasram ekaṃ satataṃ gaṇayet prātar utthitaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:673: VMv_4.57 nābhyāsarahitas tiṣṭhen muhūrtam api na svapet /
XXvamvuppu:677: VMv_4.59 mriyante tu vilomena mūḍhā bhogaikatatparāḥ /
XXvamvuppu:678: svabhāvas tv anulomaḥ syād vilomas tadviparyayāt //
XXvamvuppu:682: nirodhanāt kumbhakaḥ syāt taj japakrama ucyate //
XXvamvuppu:686: ṣaṭtriṃśanmātriko hīno madhyaḥ syād dviguṇas tathā //
XXvamvuppu:687: VMv_4.64 jyeṣṭhas tu triguṇo jñeyaḥ kumbhakas tena jīyate /
XXvamvuppu:688: prathamaṃ kumbhakaṃ kṛtvā paścāt svaṃ jānumaṇḍalam //
XXvamvuppu:689: VMv_4.65 pāṇinā triḥ parāmṛśya ṣaḍ dadyāc choṭikās tataḥ /
XXvamvuppu:691: VMv_4.66 ṣaṭtriṃśan mātrā yāvat syus tāvad yā kumbhakakriyā /
XXvamvuppu:692: udghāto 'sau mato hīno madhyamo dviguṇas tataḥ //
XXvamvuppu:695: VMv_4.68 jyeṣṭhodghātāvadhiṃ yāvat kumbhakaś cet pravartate /
XXvamvuppu:697: VMv_4.69 martavyadivasaṃ jñātvā yo nirodhena tiṣṭhati /
XXvamvuppu:704: ākāśam iva taṃ mṛtyuḥ paśyann api na paśyati //
XXvamvuppu:705: VMv_4.73 saṃtyajya vāyum athavā tattvam eva sadācaret /
XXvamvuppu:709: VMv_4.75 tattvaṃ ca śūnyatā proktā sarvākāravarātmikā /
XXvamvuppu:710: tām evābhyasyato nityaṃ mṛtyur āyāti vañcanām //
XXvamvuppu:714: VMv_4.77 na cintāṃ cintayec cintyām acintyāṃ naiva cintayet /
XXvamvuppu:715: cintyācintyāṃ na cintayet tataḥ prāpsyati śūnyatām //
XXvamvuppu:716: VMv_4.78 na bhāvaṃ bhāvayed vidvān nāpy abhāvaṃ vibhāvayet /
XXvamvuppu:719: śūnyatāṃ bhāvayen nityaṃ mṛtyunā naiva dṛśyate //
XXvamvuppu:720: VMv_4.80 vikalpamātrasaṃbhūtaṃ mṛtyuṃ so 'pi na paśyati /
XXvamvuppu:721: anyāṃś ca bahulān mārān saṃsāraṃ ca na paśyati //
XXvamvuppu:725: VMv_4.82 vikalpaḥ sarvaduḥkhāni vikalpo mṛtyur ucyate /
XXvamvuppu:728: tat tat tu sphuṭatāṃ yāti kāmaśokādibuddhivat //
XXvamvuppu:729: VMv_4.84 sulabhāni hi śāstrāṇi prayogās te sudurlabhāḥ /
XXvamvuppu:735: VMv_4.87 pariṇāmāt tanoḥ puṣṭiḥ puṣṭer balavivardhanam /
XXvamvuppu:736: balāt syād āyuṣo vṛddhis tadvṛddheś cirajīvitam //
XXvamvuppu:737: VMv_4.88 pratyakṣasiddhaṃ sarveṣāṃ yathā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:741: VMv_4.90 yathā tathāyaṃ deho 'pi mriyamāṇo jarādibhiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:743: VMv_4.91 yathā jīrṇasya gehasya saṃskāreṇa cirasthitiḥ /
XXvamvuppu:744: tathā jīrṇasya dehasya saṃskāreṇa na kiṃ bhavet //
XXvamvuppu:745: VMv_4.92 na duṣkaraṃ kiṃ cana vikrameṇa tasmād anikṣiptadhurā yatadhvam /
XXvamvuppu:746: nityapravṛttā vibhinatti kāle śilātalaṃ mṛdv api vāridhārā //
XXvamvuppu:747: VMv_4.93 kāṣṭhād agnir jāyate mathyamānād bhūmis toyaṃ khanyamānā dadāti /
XXvamvuppu:748: sotsāhānāṃ nāsty asādhyaṃ narāṇāṃ nyāyārabdhāḥ sarvayatnāḥ phalanti //
XXvamvuppu:749: VMv_4.94 subahūny api vijñāya vañcanāni mṛter iha /
XXvamvuppu:750: ananuṣṭhānād viṣṭhābhir liptvā śayyāṃ mṛtā vayam //
XXvamvuppu:751: VMv_4.95 prayogakuśalā ye ca paṇḍitāḥ śāstrapāragāḥ /
XXvamvuppu:753: VMv_4.96 jñātvāpi yogaśāstrāṇi prayogāṃś cāpy anekaśaḥ /
XXvamvuppu:754: adya śvo vā kariṣyāma iti cintāparā mṛtāḥ //
XXvamvuppu:755: VMv_4.97 idaṃ kartāsmi śvaḥ punar idam idaṃ cāsya parato vṛthā prāptāśvāso vimṛśati na lolāṃ bhavagatim /
XXvamvuppu:756: agatvā kāryāntaṃ viṣaya-salilāvartapatitā prajā mṛtyor vaktraṃ makara-mukhavan nauḥ praviśati //
XXvamvuppu:757: VMv_4.98 iti nigaditam etad vañcanaṃ mṛtyuśatroḥ svaparasamayasiddhadhyānakarmaprasādhyam /
XXvamvuppu:758: aghṛṇamaraṇabhīter yatnataḥ saṃvidheyaṃ yata iha kamanīyaṃ jīvitān nānyad asti //
XXvamvuppu:764: āptam ataḥ kuśalaṃ yad amṛtyus tena jano 'stu sa mṛtyuvimuktaḥ //
XXvamvuppu:767: // iti śrīpaṇḍitācāryavāgīśvarakīrtiviracite mṛtyuvañcanopadeśe caturthaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
